TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandableObjectConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子將可擴展的物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert expandable objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會加入屬性的物件上的方法和屬性提供。This class adds support for properties on an object to the methods and properties provided by . 若要將屬性的型別中可展開，指定這個的標準實作和。To make a type of property expandable in the , specify this for standard implementations of and . 將使用的子屬性標記以確保正確的行為，在控制項。Mark child properties with the to ensure correct behavior in a control. > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的型別變數至字串變數。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string variable. [!code-cpp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#26)] [!code-vb[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#26)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用而類別來建立自訂控制項上的可展開的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and the class to create an expandable property on a custom control. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/CS/DemoControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/VB/DemoControl.vb#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperties (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, value As Object, attributes As Attribute()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

public: override System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptorCollection ^ GetProperties(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ attributes);

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: value
param.span: ，表示要其取得其屬性的物件型別。

span.span: An that specifies the type of object to get the properties for.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 型別的陣列，可當做篩選條件使用。

span.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

summary.span: 取得由值參數所指定的物件型別的屬性集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of object specified by the value parameter.

returns.span: ，具有為這個元件所公開的屬性；如果沒有屬性，則為 。

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for the component, or if there are no properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. `attributes`陣列將會用來篩選陣列。The `attributes` array will be used to filter the array. `attributes`可以有混合和物件。The `attributes` can have a mix of and objects. 篩選是由下列規則定義：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A物件會被視為萬用字元，它會比對具有任何屬性集中的屬性。A object will be treated as a wildcard; it will match any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果屬性沒有相同類別的屬性不會包含傳回陣列中。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果屬性是的執行個體、 的屬性必須完全相符，或將不會包含傳回陣列中。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it will not be included in the returned array. - 如果指定執行個體和它的預設屬性，就會包含傳回陣列中即使沒有任何執行個體屬性中。If a instance is specified and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetPropertiesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPropertiesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定內容取得值，表示這個物件是否使用支援屬性。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports properties using the specified context.

returns.span: ，因為應該呼叫 尋找這個物件的屬性。

span.span: because should be called to find the properties of this object.

returns.span: 這個方法永遠不會傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
